about_the_game:
In this twisted chessboard realm, the Ancient Ones have laid a deadly game. As a solitary player, you'll face numerous eldritch pieces that, while following the basic rules of chess, harbor unpredictable threats.

Key Features: • Tactical combat combining chess rules with Lovecraftian elements • Diverse weapon systems and combat styles • Meticulously crafted levels and chess configurations • Deep gameplay that tests strategy and tactical judgment • Unique enemy piece combinations delivering intense combat experiences

In Each Match, You Must:

  • Choose your combat style wisely

  • Analyze enemy piece patterns

  • Deploy tactical wisdom to overcome crises

  • Maintain balance between sanity and madness

This is both a test of tactical prowess and a confrontation with the unknown. Can you find the path to victory on this haunted board and uncover the truth behind the Ancient Ones' grand design?

short_description: Roguelike! Strategy! Cthulhu! When the chessboard becomes a gateway to chaos, and every move teeters between reason and madness, can you survive to the end in this game of wits against the Elder Gods?!
